Intelligence, Peshawar, wires : " Report from Kabul dated 24th September. 30 Russians, who are all artificers, arrived Kabul on 20th from Mazari Sharif with 200 camels. It is thought in Kabul that these camels were loaded with ammunition (? and were sent) for Amir by Bolshevic."
